name: NoahofMachines
0:
”Alexa, start noah of machines”
”Alexa, open noah of machines”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: noah of machines
des:
Play an interactive science fiction-themed story with sound effects and prompts. Are you a machine enthusiast who lives in the Lego world, then share this story of the Noah of machines, the kind old good man who saves the old machines and gives them a home, evolves machines and bridges them with his space boat, have you met him and Santa and the Elves?
Get ready for laughs and giggles as players fill in the blanks. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
